name: Ychen Bannog
description: The Ychen Bannog is a gargantuan beast noted for its impressive bulk and raw power, featuring a natural armor that contributes to its formidable presence in battle.
memorable: Its ability to deal double damage to structures makes it a terrifying force in urban or fortified environments.
goals: To overpower opponents and dominate the battlefield through sheer force.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other large beasts or as a guardian of territory.
environment: Typically found in open terrains or areas where it can utilize its immense size and power.
strengths: Possesses exceptional Strength and Constitution, making it capable of dealing significant melee damage and enduring many hits.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it somewhat predictable in movement and actions.
attacks: Utilizes powerful Gore and Stomp attacks with significant piercing and bludgeoning damage, respectively.
most_powerful_ability: The Deafening Bellow can incapacitate foes within range with thunder damage and deafening effects.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 11, indicating basic awareness but not particularly keen senses.
additional_information: Can deal double damage to structures due to Siege Monster ability.
Multiattack enables it to strike multiple times in a single action.
The Overrun ability can trample over smaller foes.
DC saving throws for effects like being knocked prone add an extra layer of battlefield control.
Lacks intelligence, making it incapable of strategic thinking.
test_queries: gargantuan beast with powerful melee attacks
massive creature that deals double damage to buildings
monster that can trample foes and bellow thunder
devastating brawler known for ground-shaking attacks
formidable tank creature with high hit points
